Admiral.Title: Q
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Rotate your ship 180-degrees. Place a number of Auxiliary Power tokens beside your ship equal to the speed of the maneuver you revealed this round.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Rotate your ship 180-degrees. Place a number of Auxiliary Power tokens beside your ship equal to the speed of the maneuver you revealed this round.

Admiral.Title: William T. Riker
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Place a [SCAN] Token beside your ship. You may then perform 1 Action from your Upgrade Bar as a free Action. You cannot perform the [SCAN] Action as a free Action this round.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Place a [SCAN] Token beside your ship. You may then perform 1 Action from your Upgrade Bar as a free Action. You cannot perform the [SCAN] Action as a free Action this round.
